casebody.data:
No. 10-6552. Joe Louis Brooks, Petitioner v. John Robert Smith, Mayor of the City of Meridian, Mississippi, et al. 562 U.S. 1067, 131 S. Ct. 650,

178 L. Ed. 2d 488,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9370. November 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 382 Fed. Appx. 397.
